00011 GPProgram::GPProgram() {
00012         size = 0;
00013         fitness = 0.0;
00014         lsCoeffA = 0.0;
00015         lsCoeffB = 1.0;
00016         genome = vector<GPNode*>(0);

00019 GPProgram::GPProgram(const GPProgram &other) {
00020         //cout << "entered GPProgram copy ctor\n";
00021         this->size = other.getSize();
00022         this->fitness = other.getFitness();
00023         this->lsCoeffA = other.getLSCoeffA();
00024         this->lsCoeffB = other.getLSCoeffB();
00025 
00026         for (int i=0; i<other.getSize(); i++) {
00027                 //genome.push_back(new GPNode(*(other.getNode(i))));
00028                 genome.push_back(other.getNode(i));
00029         }
00030         //cout << "leaving GPProgram copy ctor\n";
00031 }

00033 GPProgram::GPProgram(int size, int maxDepth) {
00034         this->size = size;
00035         this->lsCoeffA = 0.0;
00036         this->lsCoeffB = 1.0;
00037         // reserve memory for the genome
00038         this->genome.reserve(size);
00039         initialise(size, maxDepth);
00040 }

00122 void GPProgram::removeNode(int index) {
00123         //cout << "entered removeNode(), index = " << index << "\n";
00124         vector<GPNode*>::iterator pos = this->genome.begin();
00125         pos += index;
00126         //delete genome[index];
00127         this->genome.erase(pos);
00128         //cout << "leaving removeNode()\n";
00129 }

00146         pos = this->genome.begin() + index;

00148         this->genome.insert(pos, gpnode);

00153 void GPProgram::insertSubtree(int index, const vector<GPNode*> &subtree) {
00154         genome.reserve(genome.size() + subtree.size());
00155         //cout << "entered insertSubtree(), index = " << index << " size = " << subtree.size() << "\n";
00156         vector<GPNode*>::iterator pos = this->genome.begin() + index;
00157         for (unsigned i=0; i<subtree.size(); i++) {
00158                 //cout << "inserting " << subtree[i]->getType() << " at position " << i << endl;
00159                 //this->genome.insert(pos, new GPNode(*(subtree[i])));
00160                 this->genome.insert(pos, (subtree[i]));
00161                 pos++;
00162         }
00163         //cout << "leaving insertSubtree()\n";
00164 }

00166 void GPProgram::removeSubtree(int start, int end) {
00167 
00168         //cout << "entered removeSubtree(), start == " << start << " end == " << end << "\n";
00169         //cout << "removing nodes from " << start << " to " << end << "\n";
00170         vector<GPNode*>::iterator first = this->genome.begin() + start;
00171         vector<GPNode*>::iterator last = this->genome.begin() + end + 1;
00172 
00173         //for (int i=start; i<end; i++) {
00174         //      delete genome[i];
00175         //}
00176 
00177         this->genome.erase(first, last);
00178         //cout << "leaving removeSubtree()\n";
00179 }

00181 vector<GPNode*> GPProgram::getSubtree(int start, int end) const {
00182         //cout << "entered getSubtree(), start == " << start << " end == " << end << endl;
00183         vector<GPNode*> ret;
00184         for (int i=start; i<end; i++) {
00185                 //ret.push_back(new GPNode(*(this->genome[i])));
00186                 ret.push_back(this->genome[i]);
00187         }
00188         //cout << "leaving getSubtree()\n";
00189         return ret;
00190 }

00202 vector<int> GPProgram::getDepths() const {
00203 
00204         vector<int> depths;
00205         depths.reserve(genome.size());
00206         int depth = -1;
00207         for (unsigned i = 0; i < genome.size(); i++) {
00208                 depth += genome[i]->getArity();
00209                 depths.push_back(depth);
00210         }
00211         return depths;
00212 }
00213 
00214 void GPProgram::initialise(int size, int maxDepth) {
00215 
00216         genome.reserve(size);
00217         GPNode *current;
00218         int rndnum = 0;
00219 
00220         // start with a terminal
00221         if (rng.flip(0.5)) {
00222                 // random variable
00223                 rndnum = intRandom(0, t_variables.size()-1);
00224                 //current = t_variables[rndnum];
00225                 //genome.push_back(new GPNode(current));
00226                 genome.push_back(&(t_variables[rndnum]));
00227                 
00228         }
00229         else {
00230                 // random constant
00231                 rndnum = intRandom(0, t_constants.size()-1);
00232                 //current = t_constants[rndnum];
00233                 //genome.push_back(new GPNode(current));
00234                 genome.push_back(&(t_constants[rndnum]));
00235         }
00236 
00237         int depth = -1;
00238         int maxdepth = -1;
00239         int lastValidLocation = 0;
00240 
00241         int currentArity = 0;
00242 
00243 
00244         for (int i = 1; i < size; i++) {
00245 
00246                 if (depth < -1) {
00247                         int sw = rng.random(3);
00248                         switch( sw ) {
00249                                 case 2: 
00250                                         // random terminal
00251                                         if (rng.flip(0.5)) {
00252                                                 // random constant
00253                                                 rndnum = intRandom(0, t_constants.size()-1);
00254                                                 current = &(t_constants[rndnum]);
00255                                                 currentArity = current->getArity();
00256                                                 genome.push_back(&(t_constants[rndnum]));
00257                                         }
00258                                         else {
00259                                                 // random variable
00260                                                 rndnum = intRandom(0, t_variables.size()-1);
00261                                                 current = &(t_variables[rndnum]);
00262                                                 currentArity = current->getArity();
00263                                                 genome.push_back(&(t_variables[rndnum]));
00264 
00265                                         } 
00266                                         break;
00267                                 case 1: 
00268                                         // random unary
00269                                         rndnum = intRandom(0, t_unaries.size()-1);
00270                                         current = &(t_unaries[rndnum]);
00271                                         currentArity = current->getArity();
00272                                         genome.push_back(&(t_unaries[rndnum]));
00273                                         break;
00274                                         
00275                                 case 0: 
00276                                         // random binary
00277                                         rndnum = intRandom(0, t_binaries.size()-1);
00278                                         current = &(t_binaries[rndnum]);
00279                                         currentArity = current->getArity();
00280                                         genome.push_back(&(t_binaries[rndnum]));
00281                         }
00282                 }
00283                 else if (depth == -1) {
00284                         switch (rng.random(2)) {
00285                                 case 1:
00286                                         // random terminal 
00287                                         if (rng.flip(0.5)) {
00288                                                 rndnum = intRandom(0, t_constants.size()-1);
00289                                                 current = &(t_constants[rndnum]);
00290                                                 currentArity = current->getArity();
00291                                                 genome.push_back(&(t_constants[rndnum]));
00292                                         }
00293                                         else {
00294                                                 rndnum = intRandom(0, t_variables.size()-1);
00295                                                 current = &(t_variables[rndnum]);
00296                                                 currentArity = current->getArity();
00297                                                 genome.push_back(&(t_variables[rndnum]));
00298                                         }
00299                                         break;
00300                                 case 0: 
00301                                         // random unary
00302                                         rndnum = intRandom(0, t_unaries.size()-1);
00303                                         current = &(t_unaries[rndnum]);
00304                                         currentArity = current->getArity();
00305                                         genome.push_back(&(t_unaries[rndnum]));
00306                                         break;
00307                         
00308                         }
00309                 }
00310 
00311                 depth += currentArity;
00312                 
00313                 maxdepth = min(depth, maxdepth);
00314 
00315                 if (maxdepth <= -maxDepth) {
00316                         break;
00317                 }
00318 
00319                 if (depth == -1) {
00320                         lastValidLocation = i;
00321                 }
00322         }
00323         this->size = lastValidLocation + 1;
00324         this->genome.resize(this->size);
00325 
00326 }

00329 
00330 ResultType GPProgram::evaluate(bool training) {
00331 
00332         clearStack();   
00333 
00334         GPNode *current;
00335         string type;
00336 
00337         int arraysize = (training) ? targets.size() : test_targets.size();
00338 
00339         ResultType ret(arraysize);
00340         ResultType doubleData(arraysize);
00341         ResultType op1(arraysize);
00342         ResultType op2(arraysize);
00343 
00344         double constData = 0;
00345 
00346         for (unsigned i = 0; i < this->genome.size(); i++) {
00347 
00348                 current = this->genome[i];
00349                 type = current->getType();
00350 
00351                 if (type == "constant") {
00352                         constData = constants[current->getData()];
00353                         createResultType(constData, doubleData); 
00354                         valueStack.push_back(doubleData);
00355                 }
00356                 else if (type == "ADD") {
00357                         op1 = valueStack.back();
00358                         valueStack.pop_back();
00359 
00360                         op2 = valueStack.back();
00361                         valueStack.pop_back();
00362 
00363                         op2+=op1;
00364 
00365                         valueStack.push_back(op2);
00366                 }
00367                 else if (type == "MIN") {
00368                         op1 = valueStack.back();
00369                         valueStack.pop_back();
00370 
00371                         op2 = valueStack.back();
00372                         valueStack.pop_back();
00373 
00374                         op2 -= op1;
00375 
00376                         valueStack.push_back(op2);
00377                 }
00378                 else if (type == "MUL") {
00379                         op1 = valueStack.back();
00380                         valueStack.pop_back();
00381 
00382                         op2 = valueStack.back();
00383                         valueStack.pop_back();
00384 
00385                         op2 *= op1;
00386 
00387                         valueStack.push_back(op2);
00388                 }
00389                 else if (type == "DIV") {
00390                         op1 = valueStack.back();
00391                         valueStack.pop_back();
00392 
00393                         op2 = valueStack.back();
00394                         valueStack.pop_back();
00395 
00396                         valueStack.push_back(protectedDivision(op2, op1));
00397                 }
00398                 else if (type == "SQR") {
00399                         op1 = valueStack.back();
00400                         valueStack.pop_back();
00401                         op1*=op1;
00402 
00403                         valueStack.push_back(op1);
00404                 }
00405                 else if (type == "COS") {
00406                         op1 = valueStack.back();
00407                         valueStack.pop_back();
00408 
00409                         valueStack.push_back(cos(op1));
00410                 }
00411                 else if (type == "SIN") {
00412                         op1 = valueStack.back();
00413                         valueStack.pop_back();
00414 
00415                         valueStack.push_back(sin(op1));
00416                 }
00417                 else if (type == "LOG") {
00418                         op1 = valueStack.back();
00419                         valueStack.pop_back();
00420 
00421                         valueStack.push_back(protectedLog(op1));
00422                 }
00423                 else if (type == "VAR") {
00424                         op1=variables[current->getData()];
00425                         valueStack.push_back(op1);
00426                 }
00427                 //else if (type == "SQRT") {
00428                 //      op1 = valueStack.back();
00429                 //      valueStack.pop_back();
00430                 //      valueStack.push_back(sqrt(op1));
00431                 //}
00432         }
00433         // result is last value on the stack
00434         ret = valueStack.back();
00435         valueStack.pop_back();
00436         // FIXME maybe check that the stack is now empty
00437         //delete current;
00438         return ret;
00439 }

00441 
00442 double GPProgram::calcFitness(bool training) {
00443 
00444         int arraysize = (training) ? targets.size() : test_targets.size();
00445 
00446         ResultType res(arraysize);
00447 
00448         if (linear_scaling) {
00449 
00450                 if (training) {
00451                         // only do this during training to calculate the coefficients
00452                         linearScaling(evaluate(true), targets);
00453                 }
00454 
00455                 ResultType lsA(arraysize);
00456                 createResultType(lsCoeffA, lsA);
00457                 ResultType lsB(arraysize);
00458                 createResultType(lsCoeffB, lsB);
00459                 lsB *= evaluate(training);
00460                 lsA += lsB;
00461                 res = (training) ? lsA - targets : lsA - test_targets;
00462                 res *= res;
00463 
00464         }
00465         else {
00466                 res = (training) ? evaluate(true) - targets : evaluate(false) - test_targets;
00467                 res *= res;
00468         }
00469 
00470         // only update fitness during training
00471         if (training) {
00472                 this->fitness =  res.sum() / (double) res.size();
00473         }
00474 
00475         return res.sum() / (double) res.size();
00476 }
00477 
00478 
00479 void GPProgram::linearScaling(const ResultType &evolved, const ResultType &target) {
00480 
00481         int count = evolved.size();
00482         double meanTarget = 0.0;
00483         double meanEvolved = 0.0;
00484         for (int i=0; i<count; i++) {
00485                 meanTarget += target[i];
00486                 meanEvolved += evolved[i];
00487         }
00488         meanTarget /= count;
00489         meanEvolved /= count;
00490 
00491         double b = 1.0;
00492         double a = 0.0;
00493         double numerator = 0.0;
00494         double denominator = 0.0;
00495 
00496         for (int i=0; i<count; i++) {
00497                 double factor = (evolved[i] - meanEvolved);
00498                 numerator+= (target[i] - meanTarget) * factor;
00499                 denominator += (factor * factor);
00500         }
00501 
00502         if (denominator != 0.0) {
00503                 b = numerator / denominator;
00504         }
00505         else if (meanEvolved == 0.0) {
00506                 b = 1.0;
00507         }
00508         else {
00509                 b = meanTarget / meanEvolved;
00510         }
00511 
00512         a = meanTarget - (b * meanEvolved);
00513 
00514         this->lsCoeffA = a;
00515         this->lsCoeffB = b;
00516 }
00517 
00518 
00519 ResultType GPProgram::getEvolvedGuesses() {
00520         return evaluate(true);
00521 }
00522 
00523 int GPProgram::getNumberOfHits(double hitsCriterion, bool  training) {
00524 
00525         int ret = 0;
00526 
00527         // depending on the value
00528         if (training) {
00529                 ret = countHits(targets, (lsCoeffA + lsCoeffB * evaluate(true)), hitsCriterion);
00530         }
00531         else {
00532                 ret = countHits(test_targets, (lsCoeffA + lsCoeffB * evaluate(false)), hitsCriterion);
00533         }
00534         
00535         return ret;
00536 }

00538 
00539 ostream& operator<<(ostream &os, const GPProgram& gpprog) {
00540 
00541         string output;
00542         stack<string> printStack;
00543 
00544         GPNode *current;
00545         string type;
00546         string data1;
00547         string data2;
00548 
00549         for (int i=0; i<gpprog.getSize(); i++) {
00550                 current = gpprog.getNode(i);
00551         
00552                 if (current->getArity() == -1) {
00553                         type = current->getType();
00554                         if (type == "VAR") {
00555                                 printStack.push("x" + intToString(current->getData()));
00556                         }
00557                         else if (type == "constant") {
00558                                 printStack.push(doubleToString(constants[current->getData()]));
00559                         }
00560                 }
00561                 else if (current->getArity() == 0) {
00562                         data1 = printStack.top();
00563                         printStack.pop();
00564                         printStack.push(current->getType() + "(" + data1 + ")");
00565                 }
00566                 else if (current->getArity() == 1) {
00567                         type = current -> getType();
00568                         data2 = printStack.top();
00569                         printStack.pop();
00570                         data1 = printStack.top();
00571                         printStack.pop();
00572                         if (type == "ADD") {
00573                                 printStack.push("(" +data1 +" + " +data2 + ")");
00574                         }
00575                         else if (type == "MIN") {
00576                                 printStack.push("(" +data1 +" - " +data2 + ")");
00577                         }
00578                         else if (type == "MUL") {
00579                                 printStack.push("(" +data1 +" * " +data2 + ")");
00580                         }
00581                         else if (type == "DIV") {
00582                                 printStack.push("(" +data1 +" / " +data2 + ")");
00583                         }
00584                 }
00585                 output = printStack.top();
00586                 //printStack.pop();
00587                 
00588         }
00589         os << gpprog.getLSCoeffA() << " + " << gpprog.getLSCoeffB() << " * " << output;
00590         // don't delete current! for some reason, it fucks everything up!
00591         // FIXME figure out why the hell this is..
00592         return os;
00593 }
